channel.title: Svnlog on Brain Baking

item.title: svnlog
item.author: wouter.groeneveld@gmail.com (Wouter Groeneveld)
item.description: Svnlog require 'nokogiri' # gem install nokogiri first! require 'csv' require 'date' # Ex. XML: <log> ... </log> # <logentry revision="x"> # => <author>name</author> # => <date>yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssss</date> # => <msg>message</msg> # </logentry> puts "SVN Release notes creator" puts "---------" puts "Revision from? (ex revision '8722' or date {YYYY-MM-DD} or 'HEAD') > " revFrom = gets.chomp puts "Revision to? > " revTo = gets.chomp puts "Getting log from SVN, hang in there.
